Class: Tile

map/tile. Tile

new Tile(img, x, y, w, h, xoverdraw, yoverdraw, defaultProps, properties)

Represents a map tile
Parameters:
Name Type Description
img DOMElement The source image
x Number The x position in the image of the tile
y Number The y position in the image of the tile
w Number The width of a tile
h Number The height of a tile
xoverdraw Number How much beyond the tile bounds does this tile draw, extending to the right
yoverdraw Number How much beyond the tile bounds does this tile draw, extending upwards
defaultProps Number Default properties for this tile type
properties Number Properties for this tile instance, which override the defaults.

Methods

getProperty(prop) → {String}

Inserts a new layer into the layer list.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
prop String The property to get
Returns:
The string value or undefined
Type
String
